org.apache.oozie.command.bundle
Class BundleJobXCommand

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.oozie.command.XCommand<BundleJobBean>
      org.apache.oozie.command.bundle.BundleJobXCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Callable<BundleJobBean>, XCallable<BundleJobBean>
public class BundleJobXCommand
extends XCommand<BundleJobBean>

Command for Getting the Bundle job bean it also gets coordinators information in the Bundle job.

execute

protected BundleJobBean execute()
                         throws CommandException
Description copied from class: XCommand
Command execution body.

This method will be invoked after the {link #loadState} and {link #verifyPrecondition} methods.

If the command requires locking, this method will be invoked ONLY if the lock has been acquired.

Specified by:
execute in class XCommand<BundleJobBean>
Returns:
a return value from the execution of the command, only meaningful if the command is executed synchronously.
Throws:
CommandException - thrown if the command execution failed.
